duties_responsibilities.duty: Attend and conduct meetings with clients and team members independently
Prepare feasibility studies and engineering design
Coordinate with other disciplines and outside consultants
Participate in the Construction Administration process
Understand governmental public and private development codes and ordinances
Provide engineering design and preparation of construction drawings and specifications
Serve as point of information and contact related to meeting minutes, shop drawings, change order reviews, and requests for information
Provide project status updates throughout design and construction

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering is required. EIT License required and future pathway to Licensed Professional Engineer
